message.body: Yes, I will talk to Annie about the possibilities tonight. I actually think you need three people
So perhaps it can be all 3 of us but we need to get rid of last drop
I'm sorry but it is just too much.
Oh no
It isn't up to me though- I am going to tell her what I can do, which is basically nothing but the minimal w the crane maybe, and then let her decide how to move forward
It really isn't my responsibility actually, and I need to get over the guilt
lol Alec and I went to a party last night of his best friend
And he got drunk and tried to Stand up to announce to the whole room That he was going to be a dad and they had no notion of true happiness bc they weren't as lucky as him LOL
It was seriously The most adorable thing
That
Is so
Cute
SERIOUSLY THOUGH
Lolololol it was seriously so cute
Then someone knocked over a snow man and he got really emotional and fixed it
And was talking to him
'Its ok little guy!! You're all better now!"
Lolol and I was like omg my dad is a moron
Alec is going to be a Dream dad
Haha ❤️❤️ I'll cc you in an email to Annie later if she is interested
We can also talk bonnie while doing crane
So it is a good plan
Bc it can overlap so it takes less of your time
Right. So wait just to clarify -- you're still gonna be the curator? Will I just be assisting with installation?
No no I don't want to curate
I don't know what Annie will say
I want to basically do nothing- maybe assist You
But it's not up to me
they are her spaces
And it is her call. But I'm not interested in running it anymore
Got it okay -- but you're just thinking that you might not totally cut this project off
Right got it
No I'm saying I don't think you can do it alone
Annie is in Vermont
Okay I see now. Well maybe I know someone who would want to do this...ugh I wish I knew more people in this city
Okay cool well yeah
Then send the email and I hope she agrees!
And one person is just not enough
Like in case of emergencies and stuff, you need someone else
Originally it was Kyle and I
I don't want you to overextend yourself like I did, I am saying I can help you
But I don't want an assistant
I want to Be the assistant lol
Yeah I understand!
That sounds like a good arrangement
Let's see what Annie says!

I want to have the most minimum work possible but I also think it's too much to put on you -so I think I can help you w install sometimes and print outs and the receptions some times but I don't want to have the responsibility any more
Like- if I need to go home and nap, I don't want it to be ME that fucked up
I don't want to get angry texts from Bailey about dropping the ball
I don't want the buck to stop w me
Is what I'm saying
But I can help you
And I don't care about picking the artists
So you and Annie can do that
If she agreed
*agrees
Want you and her to curate it, and I can be Your assistant locally
Your my bonnie assistant and I'll be your crane assistant lol it'll be fun
Yeah! Whoa that is pretty cool
Soundsssssss good to me. I hope Annie understands and doesn't make you feel bad.
Hahaha! If you feel like you're gonna feel bad I will give you our usually anti-nice girl pep talk
*usual
Switching boss roles lol
*you're
✒️puts on copy editor hat
Yeah I hope so too
I keep wanting to tell everyone I'm sorry
But it's a goddamn lie
I'm not really sorry. I couldn't be more excited about starting a family
Hahaha like I'm NOT sorry about having an unplanned baby and dropping the ball w everything
I feel guilty yeah but I'm not sorry
Lol I'm like 'sorry not sorry'
Yolo.
Lol Alec gave me the talk already!!!
These phrases help in these situations
All last night he practiced w me
And told me I was wonderful and anyone who wasn't excited for us wasn't worth our time
And real friends would understand
☺️☺️☺️this is coming from a man who ditched his best friend over his pregnancy, so my reticence at dropping my responsibilities is kind of minimal compared to the sacrifices he made
Yeah I mean Alec is spot on -- this is all true. You can't feel guilty for wanting to move on with your life...
